org.goldenorb
Interface OrbPartitionCommunicationProtocol

All Superinterfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.ipc.VersionedProtocol
All Known Implementing Classes:
MockPartitionThread, OrbPartition, OrbPartitionMember
public interface OrbPartitionCommunicationProtocol
extends org.apache.hadoop.ipc.VersionedProtocol

This interface provides a protocol framework for OrbPartitions to send messages and vertices. In most cases a class will implement the methods using Hadoop RPC for intercommunication between partitions.
